prompt: Act as a startup COO and produce a 12-month operational roadmap that prioritizes customer acquisition, retention, and unit economics. Include key milestones, metrics (CAC, LTV, churn), resource needs, and a weekly sprint breakdown.

You are an industry analyst. Generate a concise 5-point market-entry strategy for launching a SaaS product in the SMB accounting space in North America, including pricing model experiments, distribution channels, regulatory considerations, and top three risks with mitigations.

As a VP of Product, create a prioritized product roadmap using RICE scoring for the next two quarters for a mobile consumer app focused on habit formation. Provide outcomes, success metrics, and proposed experiments for each item.
Review this company profile: [paste company profile]. Provide three operational optimizations to improve gross margin by 5% within 6 months, with expected impact and implementation steps.
Draft an internal one-page playbook for scaling customer support from 3 to 30 agents in six months, covering hiring plan, training syllabus, KPIs, tooling, and escalation matrix.
Create a scenario-based financial model outline for SaaS revenue forecasting under three scenarios (conservative, base, aggressive) and list the assumptions needed for each.

Write a full marketing funnel sequence for a new content marketing tool: (a) high-level positioning statement, (b) three cold email variants, (c) four social media posts for LinkedIn, (d) a 60-second product video script, and (e) an onboarding email drip for new users.
Generate ten high-converting Google Search ad headlines and descriptions for a weekly meal-planning subscription targeting busy professionals aged 25-45.
Produce a month-long content calendar for Instagram with 12 post captions, suggested visuals, hashtags, and CTAs aimed at increasing engagement for a sustainable fashion brand.
Rewrite this product landing page copy to be clearer, more benefit-driven, and optimized for conversions (include H1, subheading, three feature bullets, and CTA): [paste existing copy].
Create an influencer outreach template to pitch a collaboration for a B2C wellness app, tailored to micro-influencers (10k-50k followers), including subject lines and follow-up sequence.
Draft five email subject lines and preheaders for a re-engagement campaign to win back churned users of a productivity app.

Act as an SEO specialist. Given keyword '[primary keyword]' produce a 1,500-word blog outline with H1/H2/H3 headings, suggested word counts, semantic keywords to include, meta description, and three internal linking suggestions.
Audit the provided page content: [paste content]. Identify on-page SEO issues, recommend improved title tags/meta descriptions, URL structure, schema suggestions, and a 3-step optimization plan.
Generate 25 long-tail keyword ideas with search intent labels (informational, commercial, transactional) for niche 'home espresso machines' and propose topic clusters.

Perform a competitor feature gap analysis for product category '[category]'. Given competitors A, B, C, list unique features, missing fundamentals, pricing comparison, and three opportunities for differentiation.
Summarize public customer reviews for competitor [competitor name] by sentiment, top praise themes, top complaints, and recommended product fixes or messaging adjustments.
Create a one-page competitive positioning matrix comparing price, target segment, core features, and brand voice for five competitors, and recommend a distinct positioning statement.

You are a prompt engineer. Convert this vague task '[user task here]' into a step-by-step prompt template with system instruction, few-shot examples, expected input/output schema, and validation tests.
Provide a meta-prompt that instructs a model to self-critique its answer against a checklist of factuality, completeness, and conciseness, then produce a revised response.
Create a reusable prompt template that adapts tone and level of detail based on user persona inputs (novice, technical, executive) with example outputs.
Craft 10 short viral social prompts (text only) designed to spark comments and shares on LinkedIn for founders â€” each under 220 characters and with clear CTA.
Write five TikTok video scripts (30-45s) for 'before/after' product stories that are easy to film and optimized for viewer retention.
Produce seven community-engagement templates for Discord: onboarding message, weekly challenge prompt, two AMA questions, feedback survey, and a retention reward announcement.
Create a character profile including background, motivations, secret desires, and a conflict they must overcome.
Invent an unusual setting and write a short scene where characters interact with this environment.
Describe a protagonist's worst fear, and craft a story in which they must confront it in an unexpected way.
Give me a three-act structure outline for a story about [your topic], emphasizing themes such as growth or transformation.
Rewrite this conversation to sound natural and full of subtext.
Draft a dialogue-only scene showing two characters arguing about a secret one of them is hiding.
Write this paragraph so it reads as genuine inner thoughts instead of narrative exposition.
Generate 20 unexpected story ideas using the following ingredients: [list your ideas/interests].
Suggest unique headline ideas or hooks for a story about [theme].
Help me brainstorm a fantasy magic system based on emotions or memories.
Rewrite my scene to intensify the sensory details - sight, sound, smell, touch, and taste.
Describe how light and color in a movie scene would convey mood and emotion.
Compose a poem about loss in the style of [poet's name].
Write a story where time stops every time someone tells a lie. Explore how this changes society.
Write a short commercial script emphasizing visual storytelling.
Create a sci-fi short story inspired by a recent scientific breakthrough or technological advance.
Edit this paragraph to remove fluff and make it clearer, but keep it conversational.
Identify repetitive phrases and suggest fresher ways to phrase the same ideas.
Suggest where my plot could use a twist or stronger emotional punch.
